pages.text: Raw squid tentacles may be found by slaughtering $(l:creatures/squid)squid$(). While edible raw, they can also be cooked.

pages.title: Calamari
pages.text: The process of preparing the squid tentacles for cooking results in an ample quantity of calamari, which themselves can be combined with other ingredients for an even more spectacular and mysterious experience!

pages.title: Epic Squid
pages.text: The purple goodness of this Epic Squid cannot be denied! While the cost to craft it is certainly high, it will satisfy almost any hunger and provide a significant amount of benefits in the process. Indeed, it can be eaten at any time purely for those benefits.
